scripts.postinstall: npx concurrently "npm run install-api" "npm run install-client"
scripts.develop: npx concurrently "npm run start-api" "npm run start-client"
scripts.create-db: cd api && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run
scripts.clean-api: cd api && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf public/*
scripts.clean-client: cd client && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf build
scripts.clean: npm run clean-api && npm run clean-client && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.first-run: npm install && npm run create-db && npm start
scripts.build: rm -rf api/public && cd client && npm install && npm run-script build && cd .. && mv client/build api/public && mv api/public/index.html api/public/something-else.html
scripts.copy-release: docker create -ti --name something-released something-webbed sh && docker cp something-released:/app/something.tar.gz ./something.tar.gz && docker rm -fv something-released
